Humidity: 91 %

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning then southwest 40 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near midnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
